title: UIElement.Clip should accept any Geometry
body:
As of now UIElement.Clip accepts only RectangleGeometry in UWP applications.
Please make changes so that it can accept any Geometry like it is in WPF.

comments.body: This should be possible now on the composition layer in 1809 with https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.ui.composition.compositiongeometricclip

Yes , We want Clip any UI with Geometry or PathGeometry.
Please Give us solution ;
